language.entry: Every cause needs a champion. A hero to rally the common men. The Forsaken was that champion. Once a proud warrior of the light, this holy crusader has been afflicted. Forced to spend the rest of eternity within a rotting corpse, it roams the land it once protected, seeking to end this miserable existence. What is left of its body restricts this shambling horror from quick movements, but provides great resilience to slicing blades.

The magic that keeps this miserable being intact also empowers it, giving the Forsaken the ability to corrupt the blood and rend the soul. The once holy blade, now desecrated. With this new found power the Forsaken will find the evil that has ended its previous existence. Then, perhaps, this fallen warrior can finally rest.
The Forsaken are outcast, forced to spend the rest of eternity in their rotting corpses alone. It's magic keeps it intact, and can help himself and his allies in the darkest of nights...
I've faced much worse than this!
Cloaked figures approach the hamlet. While at first they seem of malicious intent, their adamancy to join in this endeavor dissuades judgement.
I have no blood left to shed...
There is no hope for me.
Obviously I will have to handle this.
This magic, it is mine alone.
Light? Why have you forsaken me?
To be a crusader, thats what I wanted..
Stand aside! Let the darkness in!
The light has not abandoned us!
This magic.. I can use this!
They are nothing but dust in our wake!
I can feel it.. Shining down on me..
No! They will not take me again!
My sword.. My father gave it to me! YOU WILL NOT HAVE IT!
First my body, NOW MY MIND! IT WITHERS!
I hear their call... The damned...
The necromancer, It's calling me back!
I can hear it! I CAN HEAR IT CALLING TO ME!!
You're with them!... LEAVE ME ALONE!
Fire.. yes.. maybe that will work..
Get in my way and I will end you.
I should have done this alone.
I have sacrificed much, what's left is mine by right!
What's mine is mine, and what's yours is mine.
Why... Why did I trade her for this...
I died... Right?... What am I?
Is there no hope for me?
Damn the light! There is no god.
Why yes father, I'm definitely a high priest now
The darkness! Protect me from the darkness!
I can see the path at the end of the clearing!
Get in front of me! It wants my sword!
From back here I can watch you...
I hear it up ahead! It wants to take me again!
Maybe I can finally feel pain again!
I am invincible! I CANNOT DIE!
Order me around? Hah, I do what I please.
Blaine is a pain, Blaine is a train!
Can't kill what cant die, haha!
Nononono that's not right, that's not right at all!
What is death to me really? Just another chapter I suppose.
See the turtle of enormous girth, on his back he holds the earth.
Nothing left for me here anyways.
Might as well end it all here.
She never loved me... no one ever will now...
What's the point of even trying anymore?
There is no point in me dying again... maybe you will come back too?
You are nothing compared to me.
Move. I will have the glory and the spoils.
I've done my part. Now you deal with the rest.
You go ahead, I've better things to do.
Death has tired me. Take over.
The light has left me.. I cannot go on..
I couldn't even keep myself alive the first time!
I will not, not while it may be watching me..
No! It will take me again!
What if it hears me? What if it knows?!
No... My only chance is to hold fast.
Put myself in harms way? Have I not suffered enough?
Where did my versebook go? I must find it!
I cannot fight without my banner! Where did it go...
Can't fight on an empty stomach!
An abomination? Is that what you called me?
Anyone else hear that bone-grating sound?
My soul! They want my soul!
Come! Come! I embrace your fear!
I will not suffer your incompetance.
Compared to me, you are nothing.
No one will command me again.
I will not take part in your games.
Allow me to show you my power.
It's not even worth fighting anymore.
All I have left is hate. Let it guide my blade.
Nothing matters now... The light is extinguished.
How can the blackness glow? And yet... it RADIATES!!
The magic! I HAVE NO CONTROL!
I do not strike with my hand, I strike with my mind!
I have forgetten the face of my father.
It is over for me... For all of us...
What was that? What did you say?!
If you have something to tell me, spit it out!
I still feel it creeping through my mind!
What if I lose control? What if it takes me again?
No blood left.. But I could try anyways...
What remains of this body is a testament!
Light, end my suffering. Spare me these fools.
Look at me like that again and I will kill you while you sleep.
Give me more rations. I know I've earned it.
If I can't be rich in life... Maybe in death?
I could make it through this myself!
What point is there in struggling anymore?
Please... Let the darkness take me...
I married once. She is dead now... So am I...
Skin! What does skin feel like again?
More wood! The fire must be higher!
I don't sleep. Why? Are you scared I'll be watching you?
Send me to the light! I beg for absolution!
Smite me! Smite this unholy form!
You want to see true power? Kill me, and dispair.
You wanted me to leave, now you will!
Did you think I would wait for you to attack first?
Maybe you will join me in death?
The power to raise the dead.. Maybe I have it too!
I give myself to the light...
I will find my own way to the end.
Light preserve my soul, for my body is broken.
I was so faithfull, now I suffer?
I was worthy of greatness! Not this...
There is nothing left of me, What more can they take?!
Father.. I can still hear you...
The darkness must protect me now...
What happened? Why must this be?!
You cannot kill that which has no life.
Hm, yes... take all the glory then.
You show your weakness in every action.
Worm! I'll show you real power!
Why yes, I will marry you my beloved.
You're trying to let them win!
Hah, a muling babe could do better.
Move aside, If you cannot fell the beast, I shall.
Hah, Leaving this one for me?
We are too weak.. Pathetic even..
You're attacks do nothing! It's going to kill us all!
The final judgement is upon us I fear.
Is the enemy too strong for us?!
Blood, to fill my empty veins..
Good. Die then. Leaves more room for the rest of us.
Just a child.. He did nothing wrong!
A leper? No.. I'm much much worse.
Don't look! It will drag you in!
Soon we will all perish in darkness.
Do you conspire with them? TRAITOR!
They let you live! WHY YOU?!
All will be diseased, left to rot.
The crows! They took my eyes!
My leg! Did it fall off?
No! Take this one in my stead!
Why do you want me there?
Here is where I stand. Here is where I will fall.
Touch me again and I will slay you where you stand.
The trees, do they look joyous to you?
In rising darkness...Lu-Kthu... here all shall perish.
No! I will do it myself.
No. I shall endure my own punishment.
No. Pain and humiliation made me what I am.
A teacup? What use do I have of that.
I cannot bare your eyes upon me.
My life is a wound on the world.
I don't need your paultry magic.
Your magic is for the weak.
You're more afraid of me than I am!
Nothing will slow my pursuit of death...
Leave nothing, lest they rise again.
How many more must we kill!?
Just another step towards my retribution.
Death is fleeting. Enjoy it while it lasts.
Now... for the rest of them!
Death has shown me a glimmer of what is to come... and it is bleak.
What have I become... Just another monster?
Here, have this ale. I won't need it.
Take this, I won't need it.
You don't want to end up like me.
Believe me, there is much worse than death.
I may not have eyes, but my senses are sharp.
This form is but bones and bits of flesh, if one of us should fall... Let it be me.
What doesn't kill you only makes you stronger.
Believe me, there is much worse than death.
Quiet! I can hear its call...
...and that's how I fell...and how I rose.
Ale? I doubt it would have any effect...
No, they can see me here...
That which cannot kill me makes me stronger!
You cannot possibly be so foolish.
My abilities should not be squandered.
Only if you polish my armor.
Come now, how will this benefit me?
Why? The light has abandoned us.
Work the lash all you like, Father, I defy you!
No one is worthy - The light hates us!
Blaine is a pain, and that is the truth.
I'm the last... The last one...
Did you hear that? They come.
This is but another trial. I will not fail.
Death is my shield, I need not yours.
I do not need your pathetic magic.
You think that you are better than me? That I need you?
If you think I need you, you are sorely mistaken.
Go away! I must focus on my strength.
BEGONE! OR I WILL SMITE YOU WHERE YOU STAND!
Decapitation wouldn't be so bad at this point would it?
Food! Bah! I do not need food.
Food is for weak bodies, and weaker minds.
No stomach to speak of anyways.
Food? I lost my appetite long ago.
There is no point. I haven't bowels to speak of.
The clearing at the end of the path... I've finally found it...
You shall not bring me back under your sway!
This monster seeks to use us as his undead thralls! End him now!
You may have broken my body necromancer, but you'll never destroy my will!
I will destroy you necromancer. You shall not have these others to use as your slaves!

Każda sprawa potrzebuje czempiona. Bohatera, na którym mogą polegać zwykli ludzie. Niegdyś dumny wojownik światła, ten święty krzyżowiec został wypaczony. Zmuszony do spędzenia reszty wieczności w rozkładającym się trupie, wędruje po ziemi, którą niegdyś chronił, szukając końca swojej żałosnej egzystencji. To, co zostało z jego ciała, powstrzymuje tę powolną poczwarę przed szybkimi ruchami ale zapewnia dużą odporność na siekące miecze.

Ta sama magia, która podtrzymuje ten żałosny byt, wzmacnia go, dając Opuszczonemu zdolność do wypaczania krwi i rozrywania dusz. Jego niegdyś święty miecz jest teraz zbezczeszczony. Z tą nowo odkrytą mocą, Opuszczony znajdzie zło, które zakończyło jego poprzednie życie. Potem, może, ten upadły wojownik w końcu zazna spoczynku.
Opuszczeni to wyrzutki, zmuszeni do samotnego spędzenia reszty wieczności w ich gnijących ciałach. Ich magia trzyma ich w całości i może pomóc im i ich sojusznikom w najczarniejszej z nocy...
Widziałem rzeczy znacznie gorsze od tego!
Zakapturzone figury zawitały do Osady. Na początku zdawali się wrogo nastawieni lecz ich uparte próby dołączenia do sprawy przeczą temu osądowi.
Oczywiście… Sam muszę się tym zająć.
To… TO CIĄGLE TKWI WE MNIE!
Oni są tylko pyłem u naszych stóp
Słyszę to… WOŁA MNIE DO SIEBIE!!
Jesteście po ich stronie! ZOSTAWCIE MNIE!
Zejdź mi z drogi albo cię zniszczę
Poświęciłem wiele ale to, co zostało jest moje!
Moje. Chodź i mi to zabierz.
To, co moje, jest moje. To, co twoje, jest moje.
Czy jest dla mnie jakaś nadzieja?
Do diabła ze Światłością. Boga nie ma.
Czy ona ciągle by mnie kochała?
Owszem ojcze, jestem teraz najwyższym kapłanem.
Stań przede mną! To chce mojego miecza!
Stańcie tak, żebym mógł was widzieć…
Słyszę to! Chce mnie znowu zabrać!
Może znów będę mógł poczuć ból!
Rozkazujesz mi? Ha, zrobię, co zechcę
Ostrze to ból, ostrze to siła!
Nie można zabić czegoś, co nie żyje, hahaha!
Nienienienie, to nie tak, to całkowicie nie tak!
Czymże jest śmierć dla mnie? Pewnie po prostu kolejnym rozdziałem…
Widzę żółwia ogromnych rozmiarów. Trzyma świat na swym grzbiecie.
Tak czy inaczej, nic mi nie pozostało.
Mogę to równie dobrze zakończyć tutaj.
Nigdy mnie nie kochała… a teraz nikt już tego nie zrobi…
Tak czy inaczej, w końcu wszystko obróci się w proch.
Nie ma sensu, żeby znowu ginął… może ty powrócisz tak, jak ja?
Jesteście niczym, w porównaniu do mnie.
Odejdź. Moja jest sława i łupy.
Zrobiłem moją część. Teraz wasza kolej.
Idź przodem, ja mam lepsze rzeczy do roboty.
Światłość mnie opuściła… nie mogę iść dalej…
Nie mogłem nawet utrzymać się przy życiu za pierwszym razem!
Nie, nie, gdy to może mnie widzieć…
A co, jeśli mnie słyszy? Co jeśli wie?!
Nie… Moją jedyną szansą jest wytrwać.
Narazić się na ból? Czyż nie wycierpiałem już dość?
Gdzie się podziała moja święta księga? Muszę ją znaleźć!
Nie mogę walczyć bez mojego sztandaru! Gdzie on może być…
Nie mogę walczyć z pustym żołądkiem!
Czy ktoś jeszcze słyszy ten odgłos ocierających się o siebie kości?
Moja dusza! Oni chcą mojej duszy!
Jesteś niczym, w porównaniu do mnie.
Nikt nie będzie mi już rozkazywał.
Nie dla mnie są twoje gierki.
Pozwól mi pokazać ci moją moc.
To już nie jest nawet warte walki.
Nienawiść to jedyne, co mi zostało. Niech poprowadzi moje ostrze.
Nic już nie ma znaczenia. Światłość została wygaszona.
Jak ciemność może świecić? A jednak… ona PROMIENIUJE!!
Nie uderzę moją ręką, uderzę moim umysłem!
Wszystko już się dla mnie skończyło… dla nas wszystkich…
Jeśli masz mi coś do powiedzenia, nie krępuj się!
Ciągle czuję to w moim umyśle!
Co jeśli stracę kontrolę? Co jeśli to znowu mnie opanuje?
Nie mam już krwi… Ale i tak mogę spróbować
To, co zostało z tego ciała jest testamentem!
Jak śmeisz patrzeć mi w oczy, ty tchórzu!
Światłości, zakończ moją mękę. Zabierz mnie od tych głupców.
Spójrz tak na mnie a zamorduję cię we śnie.
Daj mi więcej racji. Zasłużyłem na nie.
Nie mogłem być bogaty za życia… A po śmierci?
Czy dalsza walka ma jakikolwiek sens?
Proszę, niech ciemność mnie w końcu zabierze…
Miałem kiedyś żonę. Teraz nie żyje… Ja też…
Skóra! Jaka jest skóra w dotyku?
Więcej drewna! Ogień musi być jaśniejszy!
Ja nie śpię. Co? Boisz się, że będę cię obserwował?
Zabierz mnie do Światłości! Błagam o rozgrzeszenie!
Chcesz zaznać prawdziwej mocy? Zabij mnie i rozpaczaj.
Chcieliście, żebym odszedł! Teraz to zrobię!
Czy ty myślisz, że będę czekał aż zaatakujesz?
Może dołączysz do mnie w śmierci?
Moc wskrzeszania umarłych… Może ja też ją posiadam?
Czy moje ramię do mnie wróci?
Światłości, ocal moją duszę. Moje ciało jest zniszczone.
Byłem taki religijny. Czemu teraz cierpię?
Moim przeznaczeniem była wielkość! Nie to…
Nic mi nie zostało. Co jeszcze mogą mi zabrać?
Teraz to ciemność musi mnie chronić…
Co się stało? Czemu tak musi być?!
Nie mogę zabić czegoś, co nie żyje.
Hm, tak… zabierz więc całą sławę dla siebie.
Pokazujesz swoją słabość każdym swoim czynem.
Odsuń się, jeśli nie potrafisz tego pokonać, ja to zrobię.
Ha, to miłe, że zostawiasz jednego dla mnie.
Jesteśmy zbyt słabi… po prostu żałośni…
Twoje ataki nic nie zdziałają! To zabije nas wszystkich!
Obawiam się, że wyrok na nas już zapadł.
Może przeciwnik jest dla nas zbyt silny?
Dobrze. Zgiń. Będzie więcej miejsca dla nas.
To tylko dziecko… Nie zrobiło nic złego!
Trędowaty? Nie… jestem czymś znacznie gorszym.
Nie patrz! To cię wciągnie do siebie!
Pozwolili ci przeżyć! CZEMU AKURAT TOBIE?!
Wszystko zostanie zarażone. Pozostawione, żeby zgniło.
Moja noga! Czy ona właśnie odpadła?
Nie! Weź jego na moje miejsce!
Spróbuj mnie jeszcze raz dotknąć a cię zabiję.
Drzewa… czy ona wyglądają zabawnie dla was?
W narastających ciemnościach… Lu-Kthu… tutaj szczeźniemy.
Nie. Ból i upokorzenie zrobiły ze mnie to, czym jestem teraz.
Kubek do herbaty? C]I co mam z nim zrobić?
Nie nie. Nic mi nie pomoże.
Nie nie. Nic mi nie pomoże.
Moje życie to skaza na tym świecie.
Boisz się mnie bardziej, niż ja sam!
Nic nie spowolni mojej gonitwy do śmierci…
Nie zostaw niczego, żeby nie powstali ponownie.
Śmierć jest krótka. Ciesz się nią, póki trwa.
To bierze początek w mojej duszy!
Śmierć pokazałą mi przebłysk tego, co nadejdzie… to takie smutne…
I oto, czym czym jestem… Kolejnym potworem?
Proszę, weź ten rum. Nie będę go potrzebował.
Weź to, nie potrzebuję już tego.
Uwierz mi, są znacznie gorsze rzeczy niż śmierć.
Może nie mam oczu, ale moje zmysły są wyostrzone jak nigdy.
Ta powłoka to trochę kości i kawałki mięsa. Jeśli któreś z nas ma paść… Niech to będę ja.
Co cię nie zabije to cię wzmocni.
Uwierz mi, są znacznie gorsze rzeczy niż śmierć.
Cisza! Słyszę, jak to mnie wzywa…
...i oto, jak upadłem… i jak powstałem.
Nigdy nie przyjmą mnie z powrotem...
Co mnie nie zabije to mnie wzmocni!
To nie jest warte mej siły.
Nie możesz być aż tak głupi.
No dobrze a co z tego będę miał?
Chłoszczcie mnie ile chcecie. Ojczę, wyrzekam się ciebie!
Nikt nie jest godzien. Światłość nas nienawidzi!
To po prostu kolejna próba. Nie zawiodę.
Śmierć jest moją tarczą. Nie potrzebuję twojej.
Myślisz, że jesteś lepszy ode mnie? Że cię potrzebuję?
Jeśli myślisz, że cię potrzebuję, jesteś w błędzie.
Odejdź! Muszę się skupić na mojej sile.
PRECZ! ALBO ZABIJĘ CIĘ NA MIEJSCU!
Dekapitacja nie byłaby taka zła w moim obecnym położeniu…
Jedzenie jest dla słabych ciał i jeszcze słabszych umysłów.
Nie mam brzucha, w którym mogłoby coś burczeć.
Jedzenie? Straciłem apetyt już dawno temu.
Nie ma potrzeby. Moje kiszki są martwe.
Światło na końcu tunelu… W końcu je znalazłem…
Nie weźmiesz mnie znowu pod swoje władanie!
Potworność tylko czyha, żeby użyć nas jako jego nieumałych sług! Zakończmy ją teraz!
Może zniszczyłeś moje ciało, nekromanto, ale nigdy nie złamiesz mej woli!
Zniszczę cię, nekromanto. Nie pozwolę ci użyć innych jako swoich sług!

Every cause needs a champion. A hero to rally the common men. The Forsaken was that champion. Once a proud warrior of the light, this holy crusader has been afflicted. Forced to spend the rest of eternity within a rotting corpse, it roams the land it once protected, seeking to end this miserable existence. What is left of its body restricts this shambling horror from quick movements, but provides great resilience to slicing blades.

The magic that keeps this miserable being intact also empowers it, giving the Forsaken the ability to corrupt the blood and rend the soul. The once holy blade, now desecrated. With this new found power the Forsaken will find the evil that has ended its previous existence. Then, perhaps, this fallen warrior can finally rest.
The Forsaken are outcast, forced to spend the rest of eternity in their rotting corpses alone. It's magic keeps it intact, and can help himself and his allies in the darkest of nights...
I've faced much worse than this!
Cloaked figures approach the hamlet. While at first they seem of malicious intent, their adamancy to join in this endeavor dissuades judgement.
I have no blood left to shed...
There is no hope for me.
Obviously I will have to handle this.
This magic, it is mine alone.
Light? Why have you forsaken me?
To be a crusader, thats what I wanted..
Stand aside! Let the darkness in!
The light has not abandoned us!
This magic.. I can use this!
They are nothing but dust in our wake!
I can feel it.. Shining down on me..
The necromancer, It's calling me back!
I can hear it! I CAN HEAR IT CALLING TO ME!!
You're with them!... LEAVE ME ALONE!
Fire.. yes.. maybe that wil work..
Get in my way and I will end you.
I should have done this alone.
I have sacrificed much, what's left is mine by right!
What's mine is mine, and what's yours is mine.
Why did I trade her for this...
I died... Right?... What am I?
Is there no hope for me?
Damn the light! There is no god.
Why yes father, I'm definitely a high priest now
The darkness! Protect me from the darkness!
I can see the path at the end of the clearing!
Get in front of me! It wants my sword!
From back here I can watch you...
I hear it up ahead! It wants to take me again!
Maybe I can finally feel pain again!
I am invincible! I CANNOT DIE!
Order me around? Hah, I do what I please.
Blaine is a pain, Blaine is a train!
Can't kill what cant die, haha!
Nononono that's not right, that's not right at all!
What is death to me really? Just another chapter I suppose.
See the turtle of enormous girth, on his back he holds the earth.
Nothing left for me here anyways.
Might as well end it all here.
She never loved me... no one ever will now...
What's the point of even trying anymore?
There is no point in me dying again... maybe you will come back too?
You are nothing compared to me.
Move. I will have the glory and the spoils.
I've done my part. Now you deal with the rest.
You go ahead, I've better things to do.
Death has tired me. Take over.
The light has left me.. I cannot go on..
I couldn't even keep myself alive the first time!
I will not, not while it may be watching me..
No! It will take me again!
What if it hears me? What if it knows?!
No... My only chance is to hold fast.
Put myself in harms way? Have I not suffered enough?
Where did my versebook go? I must find it!
I cannot fight without my banner! Where did it go...
Can't fight on an empty stomach!
An abomination? Is that what you called me?
Anyone else hear that bone-grating sound?
My soul! They want my soul!
Come! Come! I embrace your fear!
I will not suffer your incompetance.
Compared to me, you are nothing.
No one will command me again.
I will not take part in your games.
Allow me to show you my power.
It's not even worth fighting anymore.
All I have left is hate. Let it guide my blade.
Nothing matters now... The light is extinguished.
How can the blackness glow? And yet... it RADIATES!!
The magic! I HAVE NO CONTROL!
I do not strike with my hand, I strike with my mind!
I have forgetten the face of my father.
It is over for me... For all of us...
What was that? What did you say?!
If you have something to tell me, spit it out!
I still feel it creeping through my mind!
What if I lose control? What if it takes me again?
No blood left.. But I could try anyways...
What remains of this body is a testament!
Light, end my suffering. Spare me these fools.
Look at me like that again and I will kill you while you sleep.
Give me more rations. I know I've earned it.
If I can't be rich in life... Maybe in death?
I could make it through this myself!
What point is there in struggling anymore?
Please... Let the darkness take me...
I married once. She is dead now... So am I...
Skin! What does skin feel like again?
More wood! The fire must be higher!
I don't sleep. Why? Are you scared I'll be watching you?
Send me to the light! I beg for absolution!
Smite me! Smite this unholy form!
You want to see true power? Kill me, and dispair.
You wanted me to leave, now you will!
Did you think I would wait for you to attack first?
Maybe you will join me in death?
The power to raise the dead.. Maybe I have it too!
I give myself to the light...
I will find my own way to the end.
Light preserve my soul, for my body is broken.
I was so faithfull, now I suffer?
I was worthy of greatness! Not this...
There is nothing left of me, What more can they take?!
Father.. I can still hear you...
The darkness must protect me now...
What happened? Why must this be?!
You cannot kill that which has no life.
Hm, yes... take all the glory then.
You show your weakness in every action.
Worm! I'll show you real power!
Why yes, I will marry you my beloved.
You're trying to let them win!
Hah, a muling babe could do better.
Move aside, If you cannot fell the beast, I shall.
Hah, Leaving this one for me?
We are too weak.. Pathetic even..
You're attacks do nothing! It's going to kill us all!
The final judgement is upon us I fear.
Is the enemy too strong for us?!
Blood, to fill my empty veins..
Good. Die then. Leaves more room for the rest of us.
Just a child.. He did nothing wrong!
A leper? No.. I'm much much worse.
Don't look! It will drag you in!
Soon we will all perish in darkness.
Do you conspire with them? TRAITOR!
They let you live! WHY YOU?!
All will be diseased, left to rot.
The crows! They took my eyes!
My leg! Did it fall off?
No! Take this one in my stead!
Why do you want me there?
Here is where I stand. Here is where I will fall.
Touch me again and I will slay you where you stand.
The trees, do they look joyous to you?
In rising darkness...Lu-Kthu... here all shall perish.
No! I will do it myself.
No. I shall endure my own punishment.
No. Pain and humiliation made me what I am.
A teacup? What use do I have of that.
I cannot bare your eyes upon me.
My life is a wound on the world.
I don't need your paultry magic.
Your magic is for the weak.
You're more afraid of me than I am!
Nothing will slow my pursuit of death...
Leave nothing, lest they rise again.
How many more must we kill!?
Just another step towards my retribution.
Death is fleeting. Enjoy it while it lasts.
Now... for the rest of them!
Death has shown me a glimmer of what is to come... and it is bleak.
What have I become... Just another monster?
Here, have this ale. I won't need it.
Take this, I won't need it.
You don't want to end up like me.
Believe me, there is much worse than death.
I may not have eyes, but my senses are sharp.
This form is but bones and bits of flesh, if one of us should fall... Let it be me.
What doesn't kill you only makes you stronger.
Believe me, there is much worse than death.
Quiet! I can hear its call...
...and that's how I fell...and how I rose.
Ale? I doubt it would have any effect...
No, they can see me here...
That which cannot kill me makes me stronger!
You cannot possibly be so foolish.
My abilities should not be squandered.
Only if you polish my armor.
Come now, how will this benefit me?
Why? The light has abandoned us.
Work the lash all you like, Father, I defy you!
No one is worthy - The light hates us!
Blaine is a pain, and that is the truth.
I'm the last... The last one...
Did you hear that? They come.
This is but another trial. I will not fail.
Death is my shield, I need not yours.
I do not need your pathetic magic.
You think that you are better than me? That I need you?
If you think I need you, you are sorely mistaken.
Go away! I must focus on my strength.
BEGONE! OR I WILL SMITE YOU WHERE YOU STAND!
Decapitation wouldn't be so bad at this point would it?
Food! Bah! I do not need food.
Food is for weak bodies, and weaker minds.
No stomach to speak of anyways.
Food? I lost my appetite long ago.
There is no point. I haven't bowels to speak of.
The clearing at the end of the path... I've finally found it...
You shall not bring me back under your sway!
This monster seeks to use us as his undead thralls! End him now!
You may have broken my body necromancer, but you'll never destroy my will!
I will destroy you necromancer. You shall not have these others to use as your slaves!

Every cause needs a champion. A hero to rally the common men. The Forsaken was that champion. Once a proud warrior of the light, this holy crusader has been afflicted. Forced to spend the rest of eternity within a rotting corpse, it roams the land it once protected, seeking to end this miserable existence. What is left of its body restricts this shambling horror from quick movements, but provides great resilience to slicing blades.

The magic that keeps this miserable being intact also empowers it, giving the Forsaken the ability to corrupt the blood and rend the soul. The once holy blade, now desecrated. With this new found power the Forsaken will find the evil that has ended its previous existence. Then, perhaps, this fallen warrior can finally rest.
The Forsaken are outcast, forced to spend the rest of eternity in their rotting corpses alone. It's magic keeps it intact, and can help himself and his allies in the darkest of nights...
I've faced much worse than this!
Cloaked figures approach the hamlet. While at first they seem of malicious intent, their adamancy to join in this endeavor dissuades judgement.
I have no blood left to shed...
There is no hope for me.
Obviously I will have to handle this.
This magic, it is mine alone.
Light? Why have you forsaken me?
To be a crusader, thats what I wanted..
Stand aside! Let the darkness in!
The light has not abandoned us!
This magic.. I can use this!
They are nothing but dust in our wake!
I can feel it.. Shining down on me..
The necromancer, It's calling me back!
I can hear it! I CAN HEAR IT CALLING TO ME!!
You're with them!... LEAVE ME ALONE!
Fire.. yes.. maybe that wil work..
Get in my way and I will end you.
I should have done this alone.
I have sacrificed much, what's left is mine by right!
What's mine is mine, and what's yours is mine.
Why did I trade her for this...
I died... Right?... What am I?
Is there no hope for me?
Damn the light! There is no god.
Why yes father, I'm definitely a high priest now
The darkness! Protect me from the darkness!
I can see the path at the end of the clearing!
Get in front of me! It wants my sword!
From back here I can watch you...
I hear it up ahead! It wants to take me again!
Maybe I can finally feel pain again!
I am invincible! I CANNOT DIE!
Order me around? Hah, I do what I please.
Blaine is a pain, Blaine is a train!
Can't kill what cant die, haha!
Nononono that's not right, that's not right at all!
What is death to me really? Just another chapter I suppose.
See the turtle of enormous girth, on his back he holds the earth.
Nothing left for me here anyways.
Might as well end it all here.
She never loved me... no one ever will now...
What's the point of even trying anymore?
There is no point in me dying again... maybe you will come back too?
You are nothing compared to me.
Move. I will have the glory and the spoils.
I've done my part. Now you deal with the rest.
You go ahead, I've better things to do.
Death has tired me. Take over.
The light has left me.. I cannot go on..
I couldn't even keep myself alive the first time!
I will not, not while it may be watching me..
No! It will take me again!
What if it hears me? What if it knows?!
No... My only chance is to hold fast.
Put myself in harms way? Have I not suffered enough?
Where did my versebook go? I must find it!
I cannot fight without my banner! Where did it go...
Can't fight on an empty stomach!
An abomination? Is that what you called me?
Anyone else hear that bone-grating sound?
My soul! They want my soul!
Come! Come! I embrace your fear!
I will not suffer your incompetance.
Compared to me, you are nothing.
No one will command me again.
I will not take part in your games.
Allow me to show you my power.
It's not even worth fighting anymore.
All I have left is hate. Let it guide my blade.
Nothing matters now... The light is extinguished.
How can the blackness glow? And yet... it RADIATES!!
The magic! I HAVE NO CONTROL!
I do not strike with my hand, I strike with my mind!
I have forgetten the face of my father.
It is over for me... For all of us...
What was that? What did you say?!
If you have something to tell me, spit it out!
I still feel it creeping through my mind!
What if I lose control? What if it takes me again?
No blood left.. But I could try anyways...
What remains of this body is a testament!
Light, end my suffering. Spare me these fools.
Look at me like that again and I will kill you while you sleep.
Give me more rations. I know I've earned it.
If I can't be rich in life... Maybe in death?
I could make it through this myself!
What point is there in struggling anymore?
Please... Let the darkness take me...
I married once. She is dead now... So am I...
Skin! What does skin feel like again?
More wood! The fire must be higher!
I don't sleep. Why? Are you scared I'll be watching you?
Send me to the light! I beg for absolution!
Smite me! Smite this unholy form!
You want to see true power? Kill me, and dispair.
You wanted me to leave, now you will!
Did you think I would wait for you to attack first?
Maybe you will join me in death?
The power to raise the dead.. Maybe I have it too!
I give myself to the light...
I will find my own way to the end.

Для любого дела нужен борец, герой, способный сплотить простых людей. Отверженный стал таким борцом. Когда-то он был гордым воином света, но этого праведного крестоносца сразила неведомая болезнь. Вынужденный провести остаток вечности в гниющем трупе он бродит по земле, которую когда-то защищал, стремясь положить конец своему жалкому существованию. То, что осталось от тела Отверженного, ограничивает его подвижность, но обеспечивает хорошую устойчивость к порезам.

Магия, что не позволяет этому телу разложиться, также придаёт ему сил, даруя Отверженному способность извращать кровь и терзать душу. Его когда-то святой клинок осквернён. С этой новой силой Отверженный найдёт зло, что положило конец его прошлому. Тогда, вероятно, этот падший воин сможет вздохнуть с облегчением.
Отверженный - изгнанник, вынужденный провести остаток вечности в гниющем трупе. Магическая болезнь сохраняет его тело целым и может помочь ему или его союзникам тёмными ночами...
Ничто не собьёт меня с пути.
Фигуры в плащах вступили в город. На первый взгляд кажется, что они пришли сюда со злым умыслом, но их стремление присоединиться к нам рассеивает все подозрения.
Во мне не осталось крови, которую можно пролить в бою...
Мне придётся самому справиться с этим.
Она моя! Моя! И только моя!
Ты никогда не получишь эту силу.
Быть крестоносцем, вот чего я желал...
Я НИКОГДА НЕ ПРОСИЛ ОБ ЭТОМ!!
ОН..ю ОН ВСЁ ЕЩЁ СО МНОЙ!
Ты! Раздели со мной мою силу!
Эта магия... Я могу её использовать!
Они лишь пыль под нашими ногами!
Я чувствую... Как оно сияет предо мной...
Я СЛЫШУ ЭТО! Я СЛЫШУ КАК ОН ЗОВЁТ МЕНЯ!!
ТЫ С НИМИ ЗАОДНО!... ОТСТАНЬ ОТ МЕНЯ!
Если встанешь на моём пути, я убью тебя.
Я потерял слишком многое. То, что осталось, моё по праву!
Это моё. Только попробуй остановить меня.
Что моё - моё, что твоё - моё!
Я умер... Правильно?... Так что же я такое?
Разве для меня не осталось надежды?
Проклятый свет! В нём нет святости.
Почему же, отец, я ведь теперь первосвященник?
Я вижу свет в конце туннеля!
Стой впереди! Оно хочет забрать мой меч!
Стоя позади, я вижу тебя насквозь...
Я слышу её впереди! Она снова хочет забрать меня к себе!
ДА! ПОКОНЧИМ С ЭТИМ! ПОКОНЧИМ СО МНОЙ!
Кажется, я снова могу чувствовать боль!
Я НЕПОБЕДИМ! Я НЕ МОГУ УМЕРЕТЬ!
Ты приказываешь мне? Ха, я делаю, что хочу.
Блэйн - это боль, Блэйн - это поезд!
Нельзя убить то, что уже мертво, хахаха!
Не-не-не-не, это не правильно, всё, что ты говоришь, неправильно!
Что же для меня смерть? Просто новая глава, я полагаю.
Я вижу гигантскую черепаху, на её спине лежит Земля.
Она не любила меня... и никто не полюбит...
В конце концов, всё станет пылью.
Для меня нет смысла снова умирать... возможно, ты тоже отступишь?
По сравнению со мной, ты никто.
Вперёд! У меня будет слава и трофеи.
Я выполнил свою часть. Сделай всё остальное.
Сам иди вперёд! У меня есть дела поважнее.
Смерть утомила меня. Возьми её на себя.
Свет покинул меня... Я не могу продолжать бой...
Впервые я не могу поддерживать в себе жизнь!
Ещё не всё... Е-ещё не всё!!
Я не сделаю этого, пока оно смотрит на меня...
Что, если оно слышит меня? О чём оно думает?!
Хочешь отправить меня на передовую? Разве я ещё не настрадался?
Куда делся мой сборник стихов? Я должен найти его!
Я не могу сражаться без знамени! Где же оно...
Кто нибудь ещё услышал хруст костей?
Моя душа! Они пришли по мою душу!
Подойди ближе! Ближе! Я чувствую твой страх!
По сравнению со мной, ты ни на что не годен.
Я больше никому не позволю собой управлять.
Я не участвую в твоих забавах.
Во мне осталась лишь ненависть. Позволь ей повелевать моим клинком.
Моя жизнь потеряла смысл... Свет угас...
Как мрак может светиться? И более того... он СИЯЕТ!!
Магия! Я НЕ ВЛАСТЕН НАД НЕЙ!
Я сражаюсь не руками, а разумом!
Если хочешь сказать мне что-то, выкладывай!
Я чувствую, как она проникает в мой разум!
Что будет, если я выйду из-под контроля? Вдруг, она снова заберёт меня?
Крови не осталось.. Но я всё равно попробую...
Я впишу останки моего тела в завещание!
Свет, прерви мои страдания. Избавь меня от этих глупцов.
Если ты снова на меня так посмотришь, я убью тебя во сне.
Дай мне больше еды. Я её заслужил!
Если я не был богатым при жизни... Могу ли я разбогатеть после смерти?
Я бы и сам справился с этим!
Однажды я женился. Теперь она мертва... И я тоже...
Больше дров! Нам нужен большой костёр!
Я не сплю. Что? Ты боишься, слежу ли я за тобой ночью?
Отправь меня к свету! Я молю о прощении!
Покарай меня! Покарай это нечестивое тело!
Хочешь увидеть настоящую силу? Убей меня и познай отчаяние.
Хочешь, чтобы я ушёл из жизни? Ты сам покинешь нас! !
Ты правда думаешь, что я позволю тебе нанести первый удар?
Может быть, вместе отправимся на тот свет?
Сила возвращать мёртвых к жизни.. Возможно, я тоже её получу!
Я не могу устоять на ногах!
Свет уберёг мою душу, но не тело.
Я был полон надежды, почему же сейчас я страдаю?
Они хотели получить дар от меня...
Я был достоин величия! Не такого...
От меня ничего не осталось. Что ещё они хотят забрать?!
Отец.. Я всё ещё слышу тебя...
Да... Я пролью кровь по вашей команде...
Нельзя убить то, что уже мертво.
Гм, да... забери всю славу себе.
Жалкий червь! Я покажу тебе, как надо!
Ах да, я предлагаю тебе руку и сердце, моя возлюбленная.
Отойдите! Если вы не видите чудовищ, я их найду.
Ха, этого вы оставили на меня?
Твои атаки не причиняют ему вреда! Оно убьёт нас всех!
Кровь... Она заполнит мои пустые вены...
Хорошо. А теперь умри. Освободи место для выживших.
Это же просто ребёнок... Он не сделал ничего дурного!
Прокажённый? Нет... Со мной всё гораздо хуже.
Вскоре мы все погибнем во мраке.
Они оставили тебя в живых! ПОЧЕМУ ИМЕННО ТЕБЯ?!
Почему ты хочешь отправить меня туда?
Здесь я стою. Здесь я и паду.
Только тронь меня, и я убью тебя там, где стоишь.
В нарастающей тьме... Лу-Кту... мы все канем в небытие.
Нет. Я сам вынесу эту пытку.
Нет. Боль и унижения сделали меня тем, что я есть.
Кружка чая? Как я могу её использовать?.
НЕТ! ОТЕЦ, ПОЗВОЛЬ МНЕ ДЕЙСТВОВАТЬ САМОМУ!
НЕТ! Ты можешь заразиться от меня!
Нет нет. Уже ничто не поможет.
Ты так смотришь на меня... Я этого не вынесу...
Я не позволю мерзкому созданию себя трогать.
Мне не нужна магия мокрой курицы.
Нет.. ты не в силах помочь мне.
Ты больше боишься меня, чем я тебя!
Ничто не ослабит моё стремление к смерти...
Нужно превратить их в пыль, дабы они не поднялись снова.
Ещё один шаг на пути к возмездию.
Смерть мимолётна. Ей не успеваешь насладиться.
Смерть показала мне проблеск того, что меня ждёт... он весьма удручает.
Во что же я превратился... В очередного монстра?
Подойди ближе, наша сила в единстве!
Держи, выпей этот эль. Он мне не нужен.
Возьми, оно мне всё равно не пригодится.
Думаю, ты не хочешь закончить, как я.
Поверь мне, есть кое-что похуже смерти.
Этой ночью я буду стоять на страже.
Хоть у меня и нет глаз, мои чувства остры.
Моё тело состоит из костей и кусков гнилой плоти, если один из нас падёт... Пусть это буду я.
То, что нас не убивает, делает нас сильнее.
Поверь мне, есть кое-что похуже смерти.
...я не могу сказать, как я себя чувствую... и как мне подняться.
Эль? Я сомневаюсь, что он сработает...
Они никогда не вернут меня к себе...
Нет, они могут увидеть меня здесь...
То, что не убивает меня, делает меня сильнее!
Мою силу нельзя использовать для всякой ерунды.
Только если ты отполируешь мой доспех.
Подойди немедленно, как это поможет мне?
Зачем? Свет и так нас оберегает.
Выпори меня, отец, я всё равно не покорюсь тебе!
Мы все недостойны его: Свет ненавидит нас!
Блэйн - это боль, вот в чём правда.
Я должен рассчитывать только на себя.
Ты слышишь это? Они на подходе.
Это ещё одно испытание. Я его не провалю.
Мой щит - Смерть, а твой щит мне не нужен.
Мне не нужна твоя жалкая магия.
Ты считаешь себя лучше меня? Что ты мне нужен?
Если ты считаешь, что я нуждаюсь в твоей помощи, то ты глубоко ошибаешься.
Уходи! Мне нужно сосредоточиться на своей силе.
УБИРАЙСЯ! ИЛИ Я ПОКАРАЮ ТЕБЯ ТАМ, ГДЕ СТОИШЬ!
С моей точки зрения, обезглавливание - это не так уж и плохо! Не так ли?
Еда! Ха! Мне не нужна еда.
Я больше не возьму еду в рот...
Есть? Я очень давно потерял свой аппетит.
В этом не смысла. Мой кишечник давно сгнил.
Свет в конце туннеля... Я наконец нашёл его...
Этот монстр хочет превратить нас в нежить, сделав своими рабами! Нужно прикончить его сейчас же!
Может, ты почти разрушил моё тело, некромант, но тебе никогда не сломить сломить мою волю!
Я убью тебя, некромант. Больше никто не станет твоей марионеткой!

Every cause needs a champion. A hero to rally the common men. The Forsaken was that champion. Once a proud warrior of the light, this holy crusader has been afflicted. Forced to spend the rest of eternity within a rotting corpse, it roams the land it once protected, seeking to end this miserable existence. What is left of its body restricts this shambling horror from quick movements, but provides great resilience to slicing blades.

The magic that keeps this miserable being intact also empowers it, giving the Forsaken the ability to corrupt the blood and rend the soul. The once holy blade, now desecrated. With this new found power the Forsaken will find the evil that has ended its previous existence. Then, perhaps, this fallen warrior can finally rest.
The Forsaken are outcast, forced to spend the rest of eternity in their rotting corpses alone. It's magic keeps it intact, and can help himself and his allies in the darkest of nights...
I've faced much worse than this!
Cloaked figures approach the hamlet. While at first they seem of malicious intent, their adamancy to join in this endeavor dissuades judgement.
I have no blood left to shed...
There is no hope for me.
Obviously I will have to handle this.
This magic, it is mine alone.
Light? Why have you forsaken me?
To be a crusader, thats what I wanted..
Stand aside! Let the darkness in!
The light has not abandoned us!
This magic.. I can use this!
They are nothing but dust in our wake!
I can feel it.. Shining down on me..
The necromancer, It's calling me back!
I can hear it! I CAN HEAR IT CALLING TO ME!!
You're with them!... LEAVE ME ALONE!
Fire.. yes.. maybe that wil work..
Get in my way and I will end you.
I should have done this alone.
I have sacrificed much, what's left is mine by right!
What's mine is mine, and what's yours is mine.
Why did I trade her for this...
I died... Right?... What am I?
Is there no hope for me?
Damn the light! There is no god.
Why yes father, I'm definitely a high priest now
The darkness! Protect me from the darkness!
I can see the path at the end of the clearing!
Get in front of me! It wants my sword!
From back here I can watch you...
I hear it up ahead! It wants to take me again!
Maybe I can finally feel pain again!
I am invincible! I CANNOT DIE!
Order me around? Hah, I do what I please.
Blaine is a pain, Blaine is a train!
Can't kill what cant die, haha!
Nononono that's not right, that's not right at all!
What is death to me really? Just another chapter I suppose.
See the turtle of enormous girth, on his back he holds the earth.
Nothing left for me here anyways.
Might as well end it all here.
She never loved me... no one ever will now...
What's the point of even trying anymore?
There is no point in me dying again... maybe you will come back too?
You are nothing compared to me.
Move. I will have the glory and the spoils.
I've done my part. Now you deal with the rest.
You go ahead, I've better things to do.
Death has tired me. Take over.
The light has left me.. I cannot go on..
I couldn't even keep myself alive the first time!
I will not, not while it may be watching me..
No! It will take me again!
What if it hears me? What if it knows?!
No... My only chance is to hold fast.
Put myself in harms way? Have I not suffered enough?
Where did my versebook go? I must find it!
I cannot fight without my banner! Where did it go...
Can't fight on an empty stomach!
An abomination? Is that what you called me?
Anyone else hear that bone-grating sound?
My soul! They want my soul!
Come! Come! I embrace your fear!
I will not suffer your incompetance.
Compared to me, you are nothing.
No one will command me again.
I will not take part in your games.
Allow me to show you my power.
It's not even worth fighting anymore.
All I have left is hate. Let it guide my blade.
Nothing matters now... The light is extinguished.
How can the blackness glow? And yet... it RADIATES!!
The magic! I HAVE NO CONTROL!
I do not strike with my hand, I strike with my mind!
I have forgetten the face of my father.
It is over for me... For all of us...
What was that? What did you say?!
If you have something to tell me, spit it out!
I still feel it creeping through my mind!
What if I lose control? What if it takes me again?
No blood left.. But I could try anyways...
What remains of this body is a testament!
Light, end my suffering. Spare me these fools.
Look at me like that again and I will kill you while you sleep.
Give me more rations. I know I've earned it.
If I can't be rich in life... Maybe in death?
I could make it through this myself!
What point is there in struggling anymore?
Please... Let the darkness take me...
I married once. She is dead now... So am I...
Skin! What does skin feel like again?
More wood! The fire must be higher!
I don't sleep. Why? Are you scared I'll be watching you?
Send me to the light! I beg for absolution!
Smite me! Smite this unholy form!
You want to see true power? Kill me, and dispair.
You wanted me to leave, now you will!
Did you think I would wait for you to attack first?
Maybe you will join me in death?
The power to raise the dead.. Maybe I have it too!
I give myself to the light...
I will find my own way to the end.
Light preserve my soul, for my body is broken.
I was so faithfull, now I suffer?
I was worthy of greatness! Not this...
There is nothing left of me, What more can they take?!
Father.. I can still hear you...
The darkness must protect me now...
What happened? Why must this be?!
You cannot kill that which has no life.
Hm, yes... take all the glory then.
You show your weakness in every action.
Worm! I'll show you real power!
Why yes, I will marry you my beloved.
You're trying to let them win!
Hah, a muling babe could do better.
Move aside, If you cannot fell the beast, I shall.
Hah, Leaving this one for me?
We are too weak.. Pathetic even..
You're attacks do nothing! It's going to kill us all!
The final judgement is upon us I fear.
Is the enemy too strong for us?!
Blood, to fill my empty veins..
Good. Die then. Leaves more room for the rest of us.
Just a child.. He did nothing wrong!
A leper? No.. I'm much much worse.
Don't look! It will drag you in!
Soon we will all perish in darkness.
Do you conspire with them? TRAITOR!
They let you live! WHY YOU?!
All will be diseased, left to rot.
The crows! They took my eyes!
My leg! Did it fall off?
No! Take this one in my stead!
Why do you want me there?
Here is where I stand. Here is where I will fall.
Touch me again and I will slay you where you stand.
The trees, do they look joyous to you?
In rising darkness...Lu-Kthu... here all shall perish.
No! I will do it myself.
No. I shall endure my own punishment.
No. Pain and humiliation made me what I am.
A teacup? What use do I have of that.
I cannot bare your eyes upon me.
My life is a wound on the world.
I don't need your paultry magic.
Your magic is for the weak.
You're more afraid of me than I am!
Nothing will slow my pursuit of death...
Leave nothing, lest they rise again.
How many more must we kill!?
Just another step towards my retribution.
Death is fleeting. Enjoy it while it lasts.
Now... for the rest of them!
Death has shown me a glimmer of what is to come... and it is bleak.
What have I become... Just another monster?
Here, have this ale. I won't need it.
Take this, I won't need it.
You don't want to end up like me.
Believe me, there is much worse than death.
I may not have eyes, but my senses are sharp.
This form is but bones and bits of flesh, if one of us should fall... Let it be me.
What doesn't kill you only makes you stronger.
Believe me, there is much worse than death.
Quiet! I can hear its call...
...and that's how I fell...and how I rose.
Ale? I doubt it would have any effect...
No, they can see me here...
That which cannot kill me makes me stronger!
You cannot possibly be so foolish.
My abilities should not be squandered.
Only if you polish my armor.
Come now, how will this benefit me?
Why? The light has abandoned us.
Work the lash all you like, Father, I defy you!
No one is worthy - The light hates us!
Blaine is a pain, and that is the truth.
I'm the last... The last one...
Did you hear that? They come.
This is but another trial. I will not fail.
Death is my shield, I need not yours.
I do not need your pathetic magic.
You think that you are better than me? That I need you?
If you think I need you, you are sorely mistaken.
Go away! I must focus on my strength.
BEGONE! OR I WILL SMITE YOU WHERE YOU STAND!
Decapitation wouldn't be so bad at this point would it?
Food! Bah! I do not need food.
Food is for weak bodies, and weaker minds.
No stomach to speak of anyways.
Food? I lost my appetite long ago.
There is no point. I haven't bowels to speak of.
The clearing at the end of the path... I've finally found it...
You shall not bring me back under your sway!
This monster seeks to use us as his undead thralls! End him now!
You may have broken my body necromancer, but you'll never destroy my will!
I will destroy you necromancer. You shall not have these others to use as your slaves!

My life is a wound on the world.
I don't need your paultry magic.
Your magic is for the weak.
You're more afraid of me than I am!
Nothing will slow my pursuit of death...
Leave nothing, lest they rise again.
How many more must we kill!?
Just another step towards my retribution.
Death is fleeting. Enjoy it while it lasts.
Now... for the rest of them!
Death has shown me a glimmer of what is to come... and it is bleak.
What have I become... Just another monster?
Here, have this ale. I won't need it.
Take this, I won't need it.
You don't want to end up like me.
Believe me, there is much worse than death.
I may not have eyes, but my senses are sharp.
This form is but bones and bits of flesh, if one of us should fall... Let it be me.
What doesn't kill you only makes you stronger.
Believe me, there is much worse than death.
Quiet! I can hear its call...
...and that's how I fell...and how I rose.
Ale? I doubt it would have any effect...
No, they can see me here...
That which cannot kill me makes me stronger!
You cannot possibly be so foolish.
My abilities should not be squandered.
Only if you polish my armor.
Come now, how will this benefit me?
Why? The light has abandoned us.
Work the lash all you like, Father, I defy you!
No one is worthy - The light hates us!
Blaine is a pain, and that is the truth.
I'm the last... The last one...
Did you hear that? They come.
This is but another trial. I will not fail.
Death is my shield, I need not yours.
I do not need your pathetic magic.
You think that you are better than me? That I need you?
If you think I need you, you are sorely mistaken.
Go away! I must focus on my strength.
BEGONE! OR I WILL SMITE YOU WHERE YOU STAND!
Decapitation wouldn't be so bad at this point would it?
Food! Bah! I do not need food.
Food is for weak bodies, and weaker minds.
No stomach to speak of anyways.
Food? I lost my appetite long ago.
There is no point. I haven't bowels to speak of.
The clearing at the end of the path... I've finally found it...
You shall not bring me back under your sway!
This monster seeks to use us as his undead thralls! End him now!
You may have broken my body necromancer, but you'll never destroy my will!
I will destroy you necromancer. You shall not have these others to use as your slaves!

Every cause needs a champion. A hero to rally the common men. The Forsaken was that champion. Once a proud warrior of the light, this holy crusader has been afflicted. Forced to spend the rest of eternity within a rotting corpse, it roams the land it once protected, seeking to end this miserable existence. What is left of its body restricts this shambling horror from quick movements, but provides great resilience to slicing blades.

The magic that keeps this miserable being intact also empowers it, giving the Forsaken the ability to corrupt the blood and rend the soul. The once holy blade, now desecrated. With this new found power the Forsaken will find the evil that has ended its previous existence. Then, perhaps, this fallen warrior can finally rest.
The Forsaken are outcast, forced to spend the rest of eternity in their rotting corpses alone. It's magic keeps it intact, and can help himself and his allies in the darkest of nights...
I've faced much worse than this!
Cloaked figures approach the hamlet. While at first they seem of malicious intent, their adamancy to join in this endeavor dissuades judgement.
I have no blood left to shed...
There is no hope for me.
Obviously I will have to handle this.
This magic, it is mine alone.
Light? Why have you forsaken me?
To be a crusader, thats what I wanted..
Stand aside! Let the darkness in!
The light has not abandoned us!
This magic.. I can use this!
They are nothing but dust in our wake!
I can feel it.. Shining down on me..
No! They will not take me again!
My sword.. My father gave it to me! YOU WILL NOT HAVE IT!
First my body, NOW MY MIND! IT WITHERS!
I hear their call... The damned...
The necromancer, It's calling me back!
I can hear it! I CAN HEAR IT CALLING TO ME!!
You're with them!... LEAVE ME ALONE!
Fire.. yes.. maybe that will work..
Get in my way and I will end you.
I should have done this alone.
I have sacrificed much, what's left is mine by right!
What's mine is mine, and what's yours is mine.
Why... Why did I trade her for this...
I died... Right?... What am I?
Is there no hope for me?
Damn the light! There is no god.
Why yes father, I'm definitely a high priest now
The darkness! Protect me from the darkness!
I can see the path at the end of the clearing!
Get in front of me! It wants my sword!
From back here I can watch you...
I hear it up ahead! It wants to take me again!
Maybe I can finally feel pain again!
I am invincible! I CANNOT DIE!
Order me around? Hah, I do what I please.
Blaine is a pain, Blaine is a train!
Can't kill what cant die, haha!
Nononono that's not right, that's not right at all!
What is death to me really? Just another chapter I suppose.
See the turtle of enormous girth, on his back he holds the earth.
Nothing left for me here anyways.
Might as well end it all here.
She never loved me... no one ever will now...
What's the point of even trying anymore?
There is no point in me dying again... maybe you will come back too?
You are nothing compared to me.
Move. I will have the glory and the spoils.
I've done my part. Now you deal with the rest.
You go ahead, I've better things to do.
Death has tired me. Take over.
The light has left me.. I cannot go on..
I couldn't even keep myself alive the first time!
I will not, not while it may be watching me..
No! It will take me again!
What if it hears me? What if it knows?!
No... My only chance is to hold fast.
Put myself in harms way? Have I not suffered enough?
Where did my versebook go? I must find it!
I cannot fight without my banner! Where did it go...
Can't fight on an empty stomach!
An abomination? Is that what you called me?
Anyone else hear that bone-grating sound?
My soul! They want my soul!
Come! Come! I embrace your fear!
I will not suffer your incompetance.
Compared to me, you are nothing.
No one will command me again.
I will not take part in your games.
Allow me to show you my power.
It's not even worth fighting anymore.
All I have left is hate. Let it guide my blade.
Nothing matters now... The light is extinguished.
How can the blackness glow? And yet... it RADIATES!!
The magic! I HAVE NO CONTROL!
I do not strike with my hand, I strike with my mind!
I have forgetten the face of my father.
It is over for me... For all of us...
What was that? What did you say?!
If you have something to tell me, spit it out!
I still feel it creeping through my mind!
What if I lose control? What if it takes me again?
No blood left.. But I could try anyways...
What remains of this body is a testament!
Light, end my suffering. Spare me these fools.
Look at me like that again and I will kill you while you sleep.
Give me more rations. I know I've earned it.
If I can't be rich in life... Maybe in death?
I could make it through this myself!
What point is there in struggling anymore?
Please... Let the darkness take me...
I married once. She is dead now... So am I...
Skin! What does skin feel like again?
More wood! The fire must be higher!
I don't sleep. Why? Are you scared I'll be watching you?
Send me to the light! I beg for absolution!
Smite me! Smite this unholy form!
You want to see true power? Kill me, and dispair.
You wanted me to leave, now you will!
Did you think I would wait for you to attack first?
Maybe you will join me in death?
The power to raise the dead.. Maybe I have it too!
I give myself to the light...
I will find my own way to the end.
Light preserve my soul, for my body is broken.
I was so faithfull, now I suffer?
I was worthy of greatness! Not this...
There is nothing left of me, What more can they take?!
Father.. I can still hear you...
The darkness must protect me now...
What happened? Why must this be?!

Hm, yes... take all the glory then.

Worm! I'll show you real power!
